data.lyric:
[ti:Beat Box (Explicit)]
[ar:SpotemGottem]
[al:Beat Box (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Beat Box (Explicit) - SpotemGottem
[00:00.84]Lyrics by：Nehemiah Harden
[00:01.68]Composed by：Nehemiah Harden
[00:02.52]Leggo
[00:04.91]D**n E this s**t exclusive
[00:06.29]Stretch gang
[00:08.01]Face shots at the face don't trip on yo lace
[00:11.06]Mafia
[00:11.77]Bur-Bur-Burn away a carbon beam knocked yo legs off
[00:15.04]Tried to get away from me had a stand off
[00:18.12]Hit 'em in the spine knock his dreads off
[00:21.01]My woadie just caught a body I nicknamed him Randy Moss
[00:24.14]Thuggin' in my Reebok's riding with a G-SHOCK
[00:27.16]Shh- I heard he shot Draco make a beat box
[00:30.14]OG made that sharp turn woadie spot 'em peeled the car
[00:33.40]Out of mind Draco make 'em beat box
[00:36.51]In Miami with my mo'f**kin' heat out
[00:39.47]Another n***a b***h said she got her feet out
[00:42.32]I walked in the party I'm on my big goon s**t
[00:45.04]Ready to get it started b***h I got no sense
[00:48.12]Oh he the plug riding round with four bricks
[00:51.20]Call me Kobe twenty-four on me
[00:53.92]Can't f**k wit' her no more
[00:54.96]That lil' b***h she do the most
[00:56.53]I get my groove on every time I see them folks
[00:59.60]I got the antidote
[01:00.93]I'm thinking that's something you needed to know
[01:02.59]I'm smooth and I'm cold she know my wrist on froze
[01:05.76]Skinny jeans on with a big bankroll
[01:08.68]She playin' my song now I got her taking off her thong
[01:11.47]I'm tryna get it on she feeling all over my Peter bone
[01:14.47]Two rights don't make a wrong it just go on and on
[01:17.62]I'm kickin' s**t like Jackie Chan till they got my kicks on
[01:20.45]And I'mma hit my target I'mma up this b***h regardless
[01:23.71]Bur-Bur-Burn away a carbon beam knocked yo legs off
[01:27.06]Tried to get away from me had a stand off
[01:30.08]Hit 'em in the spine knock his dreads off
[01:33.01]My woadie just caught a body I nicknamed him Randy Moss
[01:36.11]Thuggin' in my Reebok's riding with a G-SHOCK
[01:39.11]Shh- I heard he shot Draco make a beat box
[01:42.20]OG made that sharp turn woadie spot 'em peeled the car
[01:45.40]Out of mind Draco make 'em beat box
data.trans:
[ti:Beat Box (Explicit)]
[ar:SpotemGottem]
[al:Beat Box (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.84]//
[00:01.68]//
[00:02.52]来吧
[00:04.91]E 这玩意儿真是独特
[00:06.29]杀人不眨眼的帮派
[00:08.01]面对着面开枪 对着你不会失手
[00:11.06]黑帮
[00:11.77]熊熊燃烧 光芒闪耀 把你的腿打掉
[00:15.04]试着避开我 见到我绕着道走
[00:18.12]直击他们的脊柱 把他吓得屁滚尿流
[00:21.01]我兄弟刚刚弄倒了一个家伙 我给他改名兰迪·摩斯
[00:24.14]穿着我的锐步鞋暴走 戴上我的运动手表驰骋
[00:27.16]嘘 我听见了枪响 Draco 来段枪声砰砰的节奏
[00:30.14]原始帮派 来了个急转弯 兄弟 朝他们扣动扳机 踩下油门加速
[00:33.40]疯狂不已 Draco 来让他们惊叫连连
[00:36.51]在迈阿密 我的枪不停扫射
[00:39.47]另一个黑妞说她走出来了
[00:42.32]我来到派对现场 带着我手下的杀手
[00:45.04]准备要开始了 碧池 我没什么感觉
[00:48.12]他是地下商贩 带着大把钞票四处晃悠
[00:51.20]叫我科比 我的代表数字是二十四
[00:53.92]不能再跟她有什么瓜葛
[00:54.96]那个小贱人 她做的最多
[00:56.53]我每次都保持最佳状态 我见到了他们那伙
[00:59.60]我服用过解毒剂了
[01:00.93]我觉得这是你该了解的
[01:02.59]我优雅又冷漠 她知道我手戴昂贵饰物
[01:05.76]身着价值不菲的紧身牛仔裤
[01:08.68]她放出了我的歌 现在我让她可以脱下她剩下的衣服
[01:11.47]我试图兴奋起来 我的身体让她有充实的感受
[01:14.47]对的加上对的就不会错 只会一直一直延续下去
[01:17.62]我像成龙一样拳脚了得 直到他们都被我打得鼻青脸肿
[01:20.45]我要解决掉目标 不管怎样 我都要把这碧池拿下
[01:23.71]熊熊燃烧 光芒闪耀 把你的腿打掉
[01:27.06]试着避开我 见到我绕着道走
[01:30.08]直击他们的脊柱 把他吓得屁滚尿流
[01:33.01]我兄弟刚刚弄倒了一个家伙 我给他改名兰迪·摩斯
[01:36.11]穿着我的锐步鞋暴走 戴上我的运动手表驰骋
[01:39.11]嘘 我听见了枪响 Draco 来段枪声砰砰的节奏
[01:42.20]原始帮派 来了个急转弯 兄弟 朝他们扣动扳机 踩下油门加速
[01:45.40]疯狂不已 Draco 来让他们惊叫连连
